communication skills . Great attitude to teamwork and problem solving.  I 
am analytical and oriented to the data -driven decision making.  I 
proactively try to give an innovative touch to all the projects I follow.

  ANTONIO AULICINO

Professional profile  
I am an eclectic, curious, passionate professional.  I always seek out new 
knowledge and actively develop new skills . Excellent interpersonal and 
communication skills . Great attitude to teamwork and problem solving.  I 
am analytical and oriented to the data -driven decision making.  I 
proactively try to give an innovative touch to all the projects I follow.  
 
Professional experiences  
01/06/18 – present  Product Manager  in Exolon Group  S.p.A. (former Covestro S.p.A.)  
- Product management of polycarbonate multiwall sheets.  
- Strategic marke ting. 
- Cooperation with R&D for new products developments.  
- Inventor of a patent pending innovative sheet to maximize energy savings.  
- Cooperation with the sales organization to boost the value creation and the value 
delivery of the Company’s products and services.  
- Strategy for: pricing, applications, markets.  
- Development of post controlling tools to better drive the business.  
- Identification of market trends . 
- Strategic assessments for the identification of long -term partnerships and 
acquisitions.  
- Organizati on of webinars, seminars, workshops, conferences to promote the 
knowledge transfer both internally and externally.  
 
01/04/16 – 31/05/2018  Product Manager  and Business Development  in Matrica S.p.A.  
(J.V. Eni Versalis and Novamont)  
- Product management of specialty chemicals from renewable raw materials.  
- Strategic marketing.  
- Business development to penetrate with innovative chemicals worldwide markets, 
with a particular focus to: Europe, Far East , Australia, USA.  
- Market development for innovat ive green chemicals, with a particular focus to: 
polymers, lubricants, cosmetics, agrochemicals, metalworking fluids . 
- Organization of webinars, seminars, workshops, conferences to promote 
innovative, environmentally friendly solutions.  
 
01/03/14 – 31/03/2016  Product Manager  in Chimec S.p.A.  FOTO  

2 
 - Product management of performance chemicals for the petrochemical industry.  
- Cooperation with the sales organization to boost the value creation and the value 
delivery of the Company’s products and services.  
- Identification of market trends.  
- Cooperation with R&D for new products developments.  
- Development of an innovative method that combines laboratory measurements 
with mathematical models to predict crude oil compatibilities and minimize 
process crit icalities.  
- Development of software solutions to monitor and optimize chemical treatments 
and minimize energy consumptions.  
- Troubleshooting of oil refinery processes, with a particular focus to: crude 
distillation unit, fluid catalytic cracking, hydrodesulf urization, hydrocracking, 
coking, visbreaking, reforming, amines.  
- Organization of webinars, seminars, workshops, conferences to promote the 
knowledge transfer both internally and externally.  
 
31/05/10 – 28/02/2014  Technical Engineer  in Chimec S.p.A.  
- Cooperation with the sales organization to boost the value creation and the value 
delivery of the Company’s products and services.  
- Cooperation with R&D for new products developments  and existing product 
applications . 
- Use of linear programming to optimize g asolines blends.  
- Development of software solutions to monitor and optimize chemical treatments 
and minimize energy consumptions.

Education  
17/02/2010  Master’s degree  in Chemical Engineering  
Università degli Studi di N apoli, Federico II  
Grade: 110/110 cum laude and awarded as 3rd best student.  
Thesis: absorption of benzene in an aqueous solution of block amphiphilic copolymers.  
I studied innovative methods to reduce the VOC emission s with an aqueous solution. 
After laboratory measurements to assess the thermodynamic of the benzene absorption
